channel.title: Is this possible?
channel.description: I want to create a new npc. I want it to look like my character like have on full dragon and weild a scythe and the prayer cape and such. Wouldn't I just add that to my models folder? But idk how to make one. And then I would want it to stand at the home and id give it a dialogue. I know how to do that part I just don't know how to design the npc. Would it be hard? Should I not even bother?

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @pkatedge88 pkatedge88
item.description:
@pkatedge88 wrote:

ive seen a few tut on npc models custom on youtube. and google. i cant really help you though

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible?

item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

I want to create a new npc.
I want it to look like my character like have on full dragon and weild a scythe and the prayer cape and such.
Wouldn’t I just add that to my models folder?
But idk how to make one.
And then I would want it to stand at the home and id give it a dialogue.
I know how to do that part I just don’t know how to design the npc.
Would it be hard? Should I not even bother?
